packages.title: Cox's Bazar Beach
packages.description: Relax at the world's longest natural sea beach with golden sand and scenic sunsets.

packages.title: Sundarbans Safari
packages.description: Explore the world's largest mangrove forest and experience wildlife adventure.

packages.title: Srimangal Tea Garden
packages.description: Enjoy peaceful moments walking through lush green tea estates.

packages.title: Sajek Valley Tour
packages.description: Discover the Queen of Hills with clouds, sunrise, and tribal culture.

packages.title: Saint Martin's Island
packages.description: Relax on the only coral island of Bangladesh with crystal clear water.

packages.title: Kuakata Sea Beach
packages.description: Experience both sunrise and sunset at the same beach.

packages.title: Rangamati & Kaptai Lake
packages.description: Enjoy boating and hill views around the beautiful Kaptai Lake.

packages.title: Bandarban Hill Adventure
packages.description: Explore hills, waterfalls, and tribal villages in Bandarban.

packages.title: Ratargul Swamp Forest
packages.description: Boat through the freshwater swamp forest surrounded by greenery.

packages.title: Sylhet & Jaflong Tour
packages.description: Visit stone collection sites and flowing rivers near the border.

packages.title: Paharpur Buddhist Monastery
packages.description: Discover the largest ancient Buddhist monastery in South Asia.

packages.title: Mahasthangarh Heritage Tour
packages.description: Explore archaeological ruins of Bangladesh’s oldest city.

packages.title: Bagerhat Mosque City
packages.description: Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site with historic mosques.

packages.title: Chittagong Hill Tracts
packages.description: Experience green hills, waterfalls, and indigenous culture.

packages.title: Foy’s Lake Amusement & Resort
packages.description: Enjoy a fun-filled day surrounded by scenic lake views.

packages.title: Ahsan Manzil & Old Dhaka Tour
packages.description: Explore heritage buildings and traditional food streets.

packages.title: Sitakunda Eco Park
packages.description: Hike through eco trails and waterfalls in Sitakunda.

packages.title: Nijhum Dwip Island Tour
packages.description: Explore a remote island famous for deer and nature.

packages.title: Sonargaon Heritage Tour
packages.description: Discover the ancient capital with folk art museum.

packages.title: Lawachara National Park
packages.description: Walk through tropical rainforest and wildlife trails.

packages.title: Panam Nagar Ancient City
packages.description: Explore the historic abandoned city of Panam Nagar with centuries-old architecture.
